item.title: AI on Azure: Building Intelligent Apps
item.description:
Discover how to ship AI-powered experiences with Azure Cognitive Services and Azure OpenAI.

What You’ll Learn

  • Picking the right Azure AI service
  • Building retrieval-augmented experiences
  • Deploying AI APIs securely
  • Cost optimization for AI workloads

Prerequisites

  • Basic web development knowledge
  • Curiosity about AI workflows
